blackbeard:SwordOfWisdomOrb.NAME: Sword Of Wisdom
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, draw a card.

blackbeard:SwordOfChaosOrb.NAME: Sword Of Chaos
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, add a random card to your hand.

blackbeard:CatONineTailsOrb.NAME: Cat O' Nine Tails
DESCRIPTION: After you attack with this Weapon, give it + 2 Attack.

blackbeard:SmithingHammerOrb.NAME: Smithing Hammer
DESCRIPTION: After you attack with this Weapon and passively at the start of your turn using 1 durability, upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of the combat.

blackbeard:SwordOfFireOrb.NAME: Sword Of Fire
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, deal #b3 damage to all enemies.
